SELECT r.record_id,p.person_name,d.device_name,r.record_time,r.recog_type FROM tbl_#{wid}_person p RIGHT JOIN tbl_#{wid}_record r ON p.person_id=r.person_id LEFT JOIN tbl_#{wid}_device d ON r.device_id=d.device_id where DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%Y-%m-%d')<#{date_end} AND DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%Y-%m-%d')>#{date_start} AND ((DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%H:%i')<#{am_time_end} AND DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%H:%i')>#{am_time_start}) OR (DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%H:%i')<#{pm_time_end} AND DATE_FORMAT(r.record_time,'%H:%i')>#{pm_time_start}) )
and POSITION(#{keyword} IN p.person_name) OR POSITION(#{keyword} IN d.device_name)
order by r.record_time desc
